data.message: Met up with a friend yesterday downtown for lunch and there just wasn't enough time in the 3 hours but touch the surface of what we needed to catch up on!  It was so nice. She just moved back here from across country but at least she's back home now. We can see each other more and have time to really know each other again! We met when we were 11 or 12!

replies.message: What a wonderful story, Shirley! We're glad you'll be able to see your friend more often. Thank you for sharing. -Jenny

I love your comment, Shirley. I know how you feel but my friend could only stay a short time then back home far away again. It was so good to see her tho. There is never enough time when spending time with a very good friend.
i like ur comment shirley what a wonderfull story, shirley i very like it shirley
Saves.   Cuado.   Minene.   Tenia.   Dosanos.   Meledio. Un.   Canser.  Queseyama.   Hoskin.   Dicis
